title: Idea for new Gamemode (playing on long forgotten patches? :D)
body:
Hello there fellow league community

So i see how riot is changing a few things every season and there is nothing wrong with keeping the game interesting and new every year, buuut;
I remember the good old days, on the old map, with the old, now reworked champions and all some long forgotten items...
So i thought, maybe it's possible to bring that stuff back.
Maybe in the form of a new gamemode, like every few weeks you can play on an older patch for a few days in honor of "the good old days".
I have no idea if that would even be possible, but i cant get this idea out of my head so i thought i'd post it here to see what the experts think,
and maybe get riot interested in this idea? :D

Thanks for reading {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

replies.body:
I would rather recommend the implementation of classic champion skill sets and classic skins, which can be unlocked with some kind of achievement system.

Also a map rotation would be nice, like you said, but without changing the current itemsets. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
cant wait for the unbalanced fun in this
